   -------------------- shapelib 1.4.0 --------------------

This is a pre-built Release 1.4.0 of a library to read shapefiles
containing maps.

The full source is available at: http://download.osgeo.org/shapelib

The source for this projection library is available under an MIT-style 
license, as described here: 
http://shapelib.maptools.org/license.html

There is additional information about shapelib in web/index.html

   ---------------------------------------------------

The directory structure is as follows:
 
  include/ 
  lib/<platform>/
  web/
